In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey for a long time to come,'' Eric Schmidt said. Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Page said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.'' coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed!
